class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><p class="mb-0 text-body-sm rr-mask">Job Posting Details:

We are seeking skilled English (Indian) voice talents to collaborate on an exciting Voice AI cloning project. This role involves recording a variety of scripts, prompts and spontaneous conversations in your natural voice to help us develop a high-quality AI model. If you are chosen, with your consent, your voice will be transformed into a cloned voice that can replicate your tone, style, and nuances. You will be required to participate in live directed sessions.  

*Key Responsibilities*
- Deliver high-quality audio files in accordance with project specifications.
- Provide written consent for the ethical use of your voice for cloning purposes.


*Qualifications*
- Clear, consistent, and professional speaking voice.
- Previous experience in voice acting, narration, or broadcasting is a plus but not required.
- Access to high-quality recording equipment (microphone, soundproofing preferred).
- Must be willing to travel to selected recording studios within the next month for 1-2 days. Ideally, flexibility in scheduling to accommodate these sessions (travel expenses will be covered)

*Compensation*
This is a paid opportunity. Compensation will be competitive and based on the projects scope and the quality of your voice recordings.  You will be paid for the audio recordings and also for the use of your Cloned Voice.

*Additional Information:*
*Ethical Use:* Your voice data will only be used for agreed-upon purposes
*Data Usage:*  Your voice WILL NOT be cloned from these recordings, additional license terms to be negotiated if you are chosen as a clone.  This data is for internal training purposes only
*Artists need to disclose if they are already the voice of a large tech company*

*Phase 1: Audition*

Please use the attached script to provide an audition file for this project using the language you are applying for. The audition file must meet the following specifications: 

- 48 kHz sample rate, 24-bit depth
- WAV format
- Noise floor of -60dB or better
- Minimal background noise


*Phase 2: Test Session*
A small number of top candidates will be selected to record a test session to verify that they are a good fit for the project. Before recording the test session, talent will be required to sign a consent release (Full buyout, 1 year term, with the option to renew annually at the same rate).
Your test session will be used for testing your voices suitability for the final product. Your voice will not be cloned from a test session. Being selected for the test session does not guarantee that you will proceed to the next phase. You will be compensated for this test session.

*Phase 2: Formal Recording*
Talent will be required to travel to a professional studio where they will record with other voice talents as conversation partners. Studio costs to be covered by the client. Travel compensation to be determined.
The recording sessions will not be scripted, it will be spontaneous recordings with a session director providing prompts & questions to answer.

*Phase 3: Usage/Exclusivity Selection*
After formal recording is completed, the client will determine whether they wish to proceed with the usage/exclusivity agreement. If the client proceeds, and the talent agrees, the client will create an AI Voice that will be a direct clone of the selected talents' name, voice, statements, sounds, other personal audio attributes, and any component thereof (including any mannerisms, identifying features, or tonal qualities or other aspects of Talents voice, and Talents identity as reflected or embodied therein).

**Exclusivity: No other AI Voices for other companies within the 1 year usage.**

*Phase 4: Additional Recordings*
Once you have been selected to proceed, you may be required to complete additional recordings according to the usage/exclusivity agreement. You will be compensated for any additional session hours at the same hourly rate that you agree upon with the end client.</p></div> <!----></div> <!----> <!----></div></article> <!----><article marketing and design agency inspired by the Cambrian Explosion - a pivotal moment 540 million years ago when complex life forms rapidly evolved and diversified. 
What We Need: A simple, clean logo mark that captures the essence of evolution and natural growth. Think fossil-inspired, organic forms - but modern and sophisticated.

Style: Minimalist line art similar to the attached inspiration images
Form: Consider ammonite spirals, trilobite shells, or other Cambrian fossil shapes
Feel: Authentic, humble, timeless - not flashy or overly corporate
Applications: Must work as both a standalone icon and with typography

Think natural, organic palette - colors you'd find in actual fossils and sedimentary rock.

What to Avoid:
- Bright, tech-y colors
- Overly complex designs
- Corporate/sterile feeling
- Literal dinosaur imagery

Deliverables:
- Logo
- 2-3 color variations
- 5-6 icons for the website
- Vector files (AI/EPS)
- High-res PNG files

References:
Please review the attached inspiration images showing clean, organic line work and natural color palettes. The terracotta bowl logo and spiral/shell designs are particularly relevant to our aesthetic.

Looking for someone who understands minimalist design and can create something that feels both ancient and contemporary.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-1efe52e7="" data-test="TokenClamp JobAttrs"><!----> <div class="air3-token-wrap" data-v-1efe52e7=""><button data-test="token" type="button" class="air3-token" data-v-1efe52e7=""><span data-v-1efe52e7="">Logo Design</span></button></div><div class="air3-token-wrap" data-v-1efe52e7=""><button data-test="token" type="button" class="air3-token" data-v-1efe52e7=""><span data-v-1efe52e7="">Graphic Design</span></button></div><div class="air3-token-wrap" data-v-1efe52e7=""><button data-test="token" type="button" class="air3-token" data-v-1efe52e7=""><span data-v-1efe52e7="">Brand Identity & Guidelines</span></button></div><div class="air3-token-wrap" data-v-1efe52e7=""><button data-test="token" type="button" class="air3-token" data-v-1efe52e7=""><span data-v-1efe52e7="">Illustration</span></button></div> <!----></div> <!----></div></article> <!----><article data-ev-job-uid="1968863984225364981" data-ev-label="search_results_impression" data-ev-label-prefix="" data-ev-sublocation="search_results" data-ev-page_number="1" data-ev-position="8" impression="0.5" class="job-tile cursor-pointer px-md-4 air3-card air3-card-list px-4x" data-v-64a3fdd4="" data-test="JobTile" data-test-key="1968863984225364981" eh-i="true"><!----> <!----> <div class="job-tile-header d-flex align-items-start" data-v-64a3fdd4=""><div data-ev-job-uid="1968863984225364981" data-ev-opening_uid="1968863984225364981" data-ev-relevance="{"position":"7"}" class="d-flex flex-column job-tile-header-line-height flex-1 mr-4 mb-3 flex-wrap" data-v-6e74a038="" data-v-64a3fdd4="" data-test="JobTileHeader"><small data-test="job-pubilshed-date" class="text-light mb-1" data-v-6e74a038=""><span data-v-6e74a038="">Posted</span> <span data-v-6e74a038="">2 quarters ago</span></small> <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper" style="--lines: 2; Scope:
You will produce visually appealing reports that follow a consistent structure, typically covering:
- Economic Overview  GDP growth, trade agreements, investment climate.
- Demographic Snapshot  population, age profiles, income trends, cultural context.
- Consumer Behaviour & Societal Trends  generational insights, purchasing habits, lifestyle changes.
- Category & Channel Overviews  market size, key players, growth forecasts across relevant product categories and distribution channels (e.g., retail, e-commerce).
- Market Access & Regulatory Requirements  import/export, labelling, packaging, compliance considerations.

You will receive source market data and reference materials covering the majority of the required fields, but will also need to conduct supplementary desk research to keep insights current and comprehensive.

Responsibilities
- Research and synthesise economic, demographic, and consumer trend data.
- Write clear, well-structured, insight-rich reports (~25 to 35 pages)
- Present content with tables, charts, and infographics that are easy to follow.
- Design and format the final reports in Canva, aligned with our brand style.
- Ensure accuracy, consistency, and attention to detail across all data and visuals.

Please include:
- A brief introduction to your experience in market or consumer research writing.
- Your proposed fee (fixed price per report) and estimated turnaround time.

The project will be awarded to the most competitive quote that can demonstrate the capability to accurately perform this task.</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" This role involves recording a variety of scripts, prompts and spontaneous conversations in your natural voice to help us develop a high-quality AI model. If you are chosen, with your consent, your voice will be transformed into a cloned voice that can replicate your tone, style, and nuances. You will be required to participate in live directed sessions.  \n\n*Key Responsibilities*\n- Deliver high-quality audio files in accordance with project specifications.\n- Provide written consent for the ethical use of your voice for cloning purposes.\n\n\n*Qualifications*\n- Clear, consistent, and professional speaking voice.\n- Previous experience in voice acting, narration, or broadcasting is a plus but not required.\n- Access to high-quality recording equipment (microphone, soundproofing preferred).\n- Must be willing to travel to selected recording studios within the next month for 1-2 days. Ideally, flexibility in scheduling to accommodate these sessions (travel expenses will be covered)\n\n*Compensation*\nThis is a paid opportunity. Compensation will be competitive and based on the projects scope and the quality of your voice recordings.  You will be paid for the audio recordings and also for the use of your Cloned Voice.\n\n*Additional Information:*\n*Ethical Use:* Your voice data will only be used for agreed-upon purposes\n*Data Usage:*  Your voice WILL NOT be cloned from these recordings, additional license terms to be negotiated if you are chosen as a clone.  This data is for internal training purposes only\n*Artists need to disclose if they are already the voice of a large tech company*\n\n*Phase 1: Audition*\n\nPlease use the attached script to provide an audition file for this project using the language you are applying for. The audition file must meet the following specifications: \n\n- 48 kHz sample rate, 24-bit depth\n- WAV format\n- Noise floor of -60dB or better\n- Minimal background noise\n\n\n*Phase 2: Test Session*\nA small number of top candidates will be selected to record a test session to verify that they are a good fit for the project. Before recording the test session, talent will be required to sign a consent release (Full buyout, 1 year term, with the option to renew annually at the same rate).\nYour test session will be used for testing your voices suitability for the final product. Your voice will not be cloned from a test session. Being selected for the test session does not guarantee that you will proceed to the next phase. You will be compensated for this test session.\n\n*Phase 2: Formal Recording*\nTalent will be required to travel to a professional studio where they will record with other voice talents as conversation partners. Studio costs to be covered by the client. Travel compensation to be determined.\nThe recording sessions will not be scripted, it will be spontaneous recordings with a session director providing prompts & questions to answer.\n\n*Phase 3: Usage\u002FExclusivity Selection*\nAfter formal recording is completed, the client will determine whether they wish to proceed with the usage\u002Fexclusivity agreement. If the client proceeds, and the talent agrees, the client will create an AI Voice that will be a direct clone of the selected talents' name, voice, statements, sounds, other personal audio attributes, and any component thereof (including any mannerisms, identifying features, or tonal qualities or other aspects of Talents voice, and Talents identity as reflected or embodied therein).\n\n**Exclusivity: No other AI Voices for other companies within the 1 year usage.**\n\n*Phase 4: Additional Recordings*\nOnce you have been selected to proceed, you may be required to complete additional recordings according to the usage\u002Fexclusivity agreement. clean_content: Select Categories Select Categories Experience level filter Entry Level (11,424) Intermediate (104,621) Expert (45,276) Job type filter Hourly (101,934) Custom USD Minimum hourly job rate per hour Custom USD Maximum hourly job rate per hour Fixed-Price (59,799) Less than $100 (24,842) $100 to $500 (20,467) $500 - $1K (6,080) $1K - $5K (6,775) $5K+ (1,632) Custom USD Minimum fixed price job rate Custom USD Maximum fixed price job rate Client history filter No hires (47,300) 1 to 9 hires (44,157) 10+ hires (70,180) Select client locations Select client locations Select client time zones Select client time zones Project length filter Less than one month (89,867) 1 to 3 months (99,272) 3 to 6 months (67,967) More than 6 months (84,024) Hours per week filter Less than 30 hrs/week (62,845) More than 30 hrs/week (86,538) Contract-to-hire roles (28809) Sort by Sort by: Relevance Posted last quarter [Simple Website Development for Business Plan](/jobs/Simple-Website-Development-for-Business-Plan_~021978991838886046576/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Fixed price** * **Intermediate** * **Est. budget:** **$350.00** Id like to create a 34 page website for my padel consulting company, focused on the management, development, and business growth of padel projects in the U.S. and internationally. The goal is to build a clean, modern, and professional website that highlights my experience and the services I offer to clubs, investors, and brands looking to join or expand within the fast-growing padel industry.  Reference Website For structure and concept inspiration, please check:  https://jf2academy.com/methodology https://offthewallconsulting.co/ This link is only a conceptual reference, not a design model. Id like something more elegant, premium, and minimalist, with a light palette, strong visuals, and a consulting-style aesthetic.  Website Scope (34 Pages) The site will be bilingual (English and Spanish), and Ill provide all final text and translations once the structure is approved. HOME / INICIO Hero banner with professional padel imagery and a short mission statement. Introduction to what the company does. Clear CTA (e.g., Work with us / Join the padel movement). SERVICES / SERVICIOS Detailed description of the four main service areas: Padel Club Management & Operations Corporate Events & PRO-AM Experiences Padel Academy & Player Development Investment & Consulting for New Padel Projects THE PADEL OPPORTUNITY / EL POTENCIAL DEL PDEL Section highlighting the growth of padel in the U.S. Key data and insights for investors. Market trends and opportunities. CONTACT / CONTACTO Simple contact form (Name, Email, Message). Direct email: Requirements Id like you to handle the entire project  including design, structure, hosting setup, domain connection, and publication. The design should be modern, clean, responsive, and SEO-friendly. Ill provide the text and images once the layout is ready. The goal is to have a professional digital presence ready to go live. Budget My total budget is $350 (all included)  covering design, development, hosting setup, and full delivery until the website is live. What youll need from me to begin. Posted last quarter [Freelance Digital Marketer Needed (Remote or Orlando, FL)](/jobs/Freelance-Digital-Marketer-Needed-Remote-Orlando_~021978541375273687431/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Hourly** * **Intermediate** * **Est. time:** **More than 6 months, Not sure** Description: Were a small business looking for an experienced freelance digital marketer to help us grow our online presence. Examples of other creator layouts and aesthetics we love are attached to the post. Responsibilities: Manage and optimize social media campaigns (Facebook, Instagram, etc.) Create and run paid ads (Meta, Google, or TikTok preferred) Develop simple marketing strategies and content ideas Report on campaign performance and results Requirements: Proven experience in digital marketing Strong understanding of ad targeting and analytics Available for weekly check-ins and flexible collaboration Bonus if located in Orlando, FL Posted last quarter [Shorts](/jobs/Shorts_~021978796608426238701/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Hourly** * **Intermediate** * **Est. time:** **Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week** Title:  Video Editor for Shorts (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram & Twitter)  Male Audience Focus Description: Im looking for a video editor who can create smooth, engaging short videos for YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Instagram Reels, and Twitter (X). My content is made for a male audience, so the editing style needs to be sharp, attractive, and attention-grabbing  especially in the first 3 seconds. Sound design is important too. What I Need: Short-form video editing (under 60 seconds) Smooth cuts, engaging pacing, subtitles (if needed) Good sound design  effects, background music, transitions Ability to make content visually appealing for male viewers Reference Videos (Watch to understand the style I want): https://drive.google.com/file/d/14F-GAE9fASJQV-YXyU6Yrs8Kdin2naIE/view https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EgogY0ktl595f1NESKGZNGhkE8qalRQp/view https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AIuIRexYrs29f4nu0W3ZtMYRMKzzSoSu/view https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TyYd-gXj7WhOXV0TvZn9np6aWEjAyQfe/view What You Get: Long-term work opportunity Better rates/deals if we continue working together Creative freedom (as long as it fits the audience) Before We Start: If you're interested, Ill send you a sample task to test your editing style. If the sample is good, well move forward with paid projects right away. To Apply: Tell me your usual turnaround time Confirm you're okay with doing a sample video Looking forward to finding a skilled editor to build with long-term! Posted last quarter [Build Freshness Speed Run (Android + Windows), Ads + Leaderboard, iOS-ready, ASAP](/jobs/Build-Freshness-Speed-Run-Android-Windows-Ads-Leaderboard-iOS-ready-ASAP_~021985232596989164594/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Fixed price** * **Intermediate** * **Est. budget:** **$450.00** We are seeking a skilled game developer to create a polished, lightweight endless runner game. The game features a hero who runs while shadow demons drain power, green lightning bolts restore power, and an in-game shop for extra lives and speed boosts. The game will be ad-supported with an ad-free option and include leaderboards. The initial release will be for Android and Windows PC, with potential for iOS later. Posted 2 quarters ago [English (Indian) Voice Talent for Voice AI Project](/jobs/English-Indian-Voice-Talent-for-Voice-Project_~021965152070280582921/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Fixed price** * **Est. budget:** **$1,000.00** Job Posting Details: We are seeking skilled English (Indian) voice talents to collaborate on an exciting Voice AI cloning project. This role involves recording a variety of scripts, prompts and spontaneous conversations in your natural voice to help us develop a high-quality AI model. If you are chosen, with your consent, your voice will be transformed into a cloned voice that can replicate your tone, style, and nuances. You will be required to participate in live directed sessions. \*Key Responsibilities\* - Deliver high-quality audio files in accordance with project specifications. - Provide written consent for the ethical use of your voice for cloning purposes. \*Qualifications\* - Clear, consistent, and professional speaking voice. - Previous experience in voice acting, narration, or broadcasting is a plus but not required. - Access to high-quality recording equipment (microphone, soundproofing preferred). - Must be willing to travel to selected recording studios within the next month for 1-2 days. Ideally, flexibility in scheduling to accommodate these sessions (travel expenses will be covered) \*Compensation\* This is a paid opportunity. Compensation will be competitive and based on the projects scope and the quality of your voice recordings. You will be paid for the audio recordings and also for the use of your Cloned Voice. \*Additional Information:\* \*Ethical Use:\* Your voice data will only be used for agreed-upon purposes \*Data Usage:\* Your voice WILL NOT be cloned from these recordings, additional license terms to be negotiated if you are chosen as a clone. This data is for internal training purposes only \*Artists need to disclose if they are already the voice of a large tech company\* \*Phase 1: Audition\* Please use the attached script to provide an audition file for this project using the language you are applying for. The audition file must meet the following specifications: - 48 kHz sample rate, 24-bit depth - WAV format - Noise floor of -60dB or better - Minimal background noise \*Phase 2: Test Session\* A small number of top candidates will be selected to record a test session to verify that they are a good fit for the project. Before recording the test session, talent will be required to sign a consent release (Full buyout, 1 year term, with the option to renew annually at the same rate). Your test session will be used for testing your voices suitability for the final product. Your voice will not be cloned from a test session. Being selected for the test session does not guarantee that you will proceed to the next phase. You will be compensated for this test session. \*Phase 2: Formal Recording\* Talent will be required to travel to a professional studio where they will record with other voice talents as conversation partners. Studio costs to be covered by the client. Travel compensation to be determined. The recording sessions will not be scripted, it will be spontaneous recordings with a session director providing prompts & questions to answer. \*Phase 3: Usage/Exclusivity Selection\* After formal recording is completed, the client will determine whether they wish to proceed with the usage/exclusivity agreement. If the client proceeds, and the talent agrees, the client will create an AI Voice that will be a direct clone of the selected talents' name, voice, statements, sounds, other personal audio attributes, and any component thereof (including any mannerisms, identifying features, or tonal qualities or other aspects of Talents voice, and Talents identity as reflected or embodied therein). \*\*Exclusivity: No other AI Voices for other companies within the 1 year usage.\*\* \*Phase 4: Additional Recordings\* Once you have been selected to proceed, you may be required to complete additional recordings according to the usage/exclusivity agreement. You will be compensated for any additional session hours at the same hourly rate that you agree upon with the end client. Posted 2 quarters ago [Cration de PDF Dynamique](/jobs/ation-PDF-Dynamique_~021965109198775723160/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Hourly: $13.00 - $30.00** * **Entry Level** * **Est. time:** **Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week** Je recherche quelqu'un pour transformer ces 12 documents en PDF Dynamique, faire une belle mise en page et ajouter mon logo Posted 2 quarters ago [Logo designer for small marketing agency](/jobs/Logo-designer-for-small-marketing-agency_~021955462613323734876/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Hourly: $15.00 - $35.00** * **Intermediate** * **Est. time:** **Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week** BrandCambrian is a marketing and design agency inspired by the Cambrian Explosion - a pivotal moment 540 million years ago when complex life forms rapidly evolved and diversified. What We Need: A simple, clean logo mark that captures the essence of evolution and natural growth. Think fossil-inspired, organic forms - but modern and sophisticated. Style: Minimalist line art similar to the attached inspiration images Form: Consider ammonite spirals, trilobite shells, or other Cambrian fossil shapes Feel: Authentic, humble, timeless - not flashy or overly corporate Applications: Must work as both a standalone icon and with typography Think natural, organic palette - colors you'd find in actual fossils and sedimentary rock. What to Avoid: - Bright, tech-y colors - Overly complex designs - Corporate/sterile feeling - Literal dinosaur imagery Deliverables: - Logo - 2-3 color variations - 5-6 icons for the website - Vector files (AI/EPS) - High-res PNG files References: Please review the attached inspiration images showing clean, organic line work and natural color palettes. The terracotta bowl logo and spiral/shell designs are particularly relevant to our aesthetic. Looking for someone who understands minimalist design and can create something that feels both ancient and contemporary.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses. Posted 2 quarters ago [Food and Beverage Market Report Writer - Using Canva](/jobs/Food-and-Beverage-Market-Report-Writer-Using-Canva_~021968863984225364981/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Fixed price** * **Intermediate** * **Est. budget:** **$100.00** Were looking for a detail-oriented writer to create professional, data-driven market insights reports on a project basis. Scope: You will produce visually appealing reports that follow a consistent structure, typically covering: - Economic Overview  GDP growth, trade agreements, investment climate. - Demographic Snapshot  population, age profiles, income trends, cultural context. - Consumer Behaviour & Societal Trends  generational insights, purchasing habits, lifestyle changes. - Category & Channel Overviews  market size, key players, growth forecasts across relevant product categories and distribution channels (e.g., retail, e-commerce). - Market Access & Regulatory Requirements  import/export, labelling, packaging, compliance considerations. You will receive source market data and reference materials covering the majority of the required fields, but will also need to conduct supplementary desk research to keep insights current and comprehensive. Responsibilities - Research and synthesise economic, demographic, and consumer trend data. - Write clear, well-structured, insight-rich reports (\~25 to 35 pages) - Present content with tables, charts, and infographics that are easy to follow. - Design and format the final reports in Canva, aligned with our brand style. - Ensure accuracy, consistency, and attention to detail across all data and visuals. Please include: - A brief introduction to your experience in market or consumer research writing. - Your proposed fee (fixed price per report) and estimated turnaround time. The project will be awarded to the most competitive quote that can demonstrate the capability to accurately perform this task. Posted 2 quarters ago [Illustrations needed for book](/jobs/Illustrations-needed-for-book_~021969402852687227893/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Hourly** * **Intermediate** * **Est. time:** **1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week** Im looking for an illustrator to draw me 20 images and also my book. I need this done pretty quickly as I have a deadline. The characters will be provided by me. You basically have to draw out the scene. This will be a fixed rate project. I need drawings to be in pixar style (or close), I have attached the art style I am looking for. Posted 2 quarters ago [Dutch SEO Content Optimisation - 1,000 Words](/jobs/Dutch-SEO-Content-Optimisation-000-Words_~021970046185418641015/?referrer_url_path=/nx/search/jobs/) ---------- * **Fixed price** * **Expert** * **Est. budget:** **$30.00** Please rewrite the following landing page copy to improve its SEO and overall quality. The goal is to increase the number of exact match instances of the keyword 'parkeren eindhoven airport' to 6 within the body of the text, while maintaining a professional ParkVia tone of voice (the target number does not include the H1 page title). https://www.parkvia.com/nl-NL/vliegveld-parkeren/eindhoven **Jobs Per Page:** 10
